scripts.init: clasp login && clasp create --type webapp && cp Constant.js.template Constant.js && echo 'Fill in Constant.js before running' && clasp push -f
scripts.redeploy: clasp deployments && echo 'Enter deploymentId' && read DEPLOYMENT_ID && clasp deploy --deploymentId $DEPLOYMENT_ID
scripts.test: clasp open && echo 'Test.gs 파일을 열고 TestAll 함수를 실행하세요.'
